entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
